name: Stick It to the Stick Man
storyline: This is just another day at the office.
summary:
It's a physics-brawler where you fight stick men to get your job back. Fire them or be fired yourself!

REASONS TO PLAY: It's got fly kicks, groin kicks, machine guns, glue guns, ninja stars, bicycle kicks, spinning punches, chainsaws, headbutts, coffee drinking and explosive diarrhea (and more).
